title: Hlim la Isua ropuina hliahtu kha
lyrics:
Hlim la,
Isua ropuina hliahtu kha;
Kan thinlung hi chhun eng sela,
Kalvari tlanga a tuarin,
A hmangaih lang kha, fiah takin,
Tunah hetah lang nawn rawh se.

Hmun dang
Phen tur khawiah nge kan hmuh ang,
A hliam chhungah ni suh sela?
I felna lakan thil dang pawh,
Min hliahkhuah thei a awm reng lo;
Chutah chuan min thukru ang che.

Chu zan
Lungngaihthlak takah Lal Isuan,
Chhang lain mal a sawmsak chuan,
A phelin, 'Hei hi' a tih chu,
"Ka taksa a ni, nangni tan,
Min hriat reng nan hi hi ti r'u."

Chutia
Uain note pawh chu a laka
Lawmthu hril zawhin a tih kha
"Ka thisena thuthlung thar chu,
He no hi a ni, in in kha,
Min hriat reng nan hei hi ti r'u."

Kan chan
Te hian mal min sawmsak vek la,
Isuan kan zingah kil sela;
Kilpui tlakah min siam ang che,
Sakramen tak lo ngei se,
Tih hlen theihna kan ngai bawk ang.

Lalpa,
Sakramen hian, Nang hre reng a,
Thiam changa lawman min pui la;
Chhang leh Uain tuiah hian Nangman,
Min pawl ngei ang che, eng mahin
Dal suh selangin, cheng reng la.
